work.name: Geodesic Research
work.summary: Researching Chain of Thought Obfuscation Generalisation in Large Language Models.
highlights: Developed experimental pipelines for reinforcement learning on Qwen-4B, including dataset construction and augmentation.

work.name: National University of Singapore
work.summary: Investigated ML-augmented subgrid-scale modelling to accelerate CFD simulations, supervised by Dr Qianxiao Li.
highlights: Implemented and benchmarked Transformer and UNet architectures for turbulence prediction.
Analysed the effect of different filtering methods on a priori and a posteriori model error under different boundary conditions.

work.name: Alpine Formula 1 team
work.summary: Worked in the Structures and Materials team.
highlights: Developed internal tools to optimise the stress analysis pipeline.
Conducted FEA using Hypermesh on components including the rocker, drybrake, and nose cone; supported FIA certification and crash test analysis.
Analysed live telemetry and cable data using ATLAS during practice and qualifying sessions in the Operations Room.

awards.title: Townsend Scholarship and Wright Prize
